definitions.definition: the inside part of your hand from your wrist to the base of your fingers:
examples: This tiny device fits into the palm of your hand.

definitions.definition: to look at the lines on the inside of someone's hand and say what these lines say about their character and future
to make something seem to disappear by hiding it in the palm of your hand as part of a trick, or to steal something by picking it up in a way that will not be noticed:
examples: I suspected that he had palmed a playing card.
